title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=c66e9dcd0a8a95af64278007680175e959e0098c
comments: The app is for only spotify premium users or those who have invite link

Oh the sessions are only for Spotify premium users at the moment, but all other features are available to YouTube users. So you can get involved in all the genre communities straight away :)

https://preview.redd.it/5vmu8omczgxa1.jpeg?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=797337f3557a8c3df4402bec8d1586b9c7a58ef9
Here's an invite link if you need it for lishash https://invite.lishash.com/qG4Y (I was told its open for everyone so you might not need the invite, don't know if it's become invite-only again)
